sentences.en: a popular holiday resort
sentences.cn: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.en: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.cn: 争取民主的全民运动

sentences.en: A spoilt child is rarely popular with other children.
sentences.cn: 被宠坏的孩子很难得到其他孩子的喜爱。

sentences.en: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.cn: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.en: Do book ahead as the restaurant is very popular.
sentences.cn: 该饭店非常受欢迎，请务必提前预订。

sentences.en: Geometric designs were popular wall decorations in the 14th century.
sentences.cn: 14世纪，几何图形是风靡一时的墙壁装饰图案。

sentences.en: He was not only talented but immensely popular with his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他不仅才华横溢，而且深受同事的喜爱。

sentences.en: Her popular pot holder is also available in do-it-yourself kits.
sentences.cn: 她那广受欢迎的防烫布垫也可以自己购买原料套装自己制作。

sentences.en: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.cn: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.en: Howard wanted to be a popular singer, but stage fright crippled him.
sentences.cn: 霍华德想成为流行歌手，但因怯场而心生畏惧。

sentences.en: It quickly became the most popular men's fragrance in the world.
sentences.cn: 它很快成为世界上最受欢迎的男士香水。

sentences.en: Potatoes are still the most popular food, followed by white bread.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯仍然是最受欢迎的食物，其次是白面包。

sentences.en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentences.cn: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

sentences.en: The bicycle reigned supreme as Britain's most popular mode of transport.
sentences.cn: 当时自行车是英国最流行的交通工具。

sentences.en: the closest popular vote in U.S. presidential history
sentences.cn: 美国总统选举史上票数最接近的一次普选

sentences.en: The fusty old establishment refused to recognise the demand for popular music.
sentences.cn: 这一古板的老旧机构拒绝承认人们对流行音乐的需求。

sentences.en: The most popular items are located toward the back of the store.
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的产品放在靠近商店最里面的地方。

sentences.en: The popular ceramics industry expanded towards the middle of the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 到19世纪中期，大众制陶业得到了发展。

sentences.en: The popular papers all have photo features on their inside pages.
sentences.cn: 通俗报纸的内页都有照片专栏.

sentences.en: This discovery seems to validate the claims of popular astrology.
sentences.cn: 这个发现似乎能印证流行占星术的一些说法。

words.tran_cn: 流行地；通俗地；普及地；大众地
流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击
普及，流行；名气；受大众欢迎
大众化的人；普及读物；普及者；使普及的人
突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声
推广，普及；使…通俗化（等于popularize）；使…受欢迎
取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动

phrases.tran_cn: 大众文化，通俗文化；流行文化
人民阵线（尤指1936至1939年的法国人民阵线）
n. 大众文学，通俗文学
n. 流行音乐；通俗音乐

trans.tran_cn: 受喜爱的，讨人喜欢的，通俗的，普遍的，民众的
trans.tran_en: liked by a lot of people
